sentences.en: Although electronic - computer have a good many advantages, but it can not supersede human.
sentences.cn: 虽然电子计算机有很多优势, 但它代替不了人.

sentences.en: Can AC Single - phase Series Connection Supersede AC Three - phase Temperature Rise Test?
sentences.cn: 交流 三相 温升试验能用交流 单相 串联试验替代 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do blundering old military dug - outs love the successful young captains who supersede them?
sentences.cn: 难道那些作战失利的老行伍会爱那些取代他们的青云直上的青年军官 吗 ?

sentences.en: Human and ecological wellbeing must supersede economic concerns if only because economies depend on ecosystems.
sentences.cn: 人类和生态系统的福址应该超越纯粹经济的考虑,因为经济依赖生态系统.

sentences.en: In case of conflict, the specific requirements supersede this standard.
sentences.cn: 若这些特殊要求与本标准相抵触时,它们可代替本标准.

sentences.en: In the future, robots will supersede human beings for very heavy work.
sentences.cn: 今后, 机器人必将取代人类的繁重劳动.

sentences.en: It is a cunning supersede the aristocracy , and make the king sole and absolute autocrat.
sentences.cn: 一笔勾销, 而把国王变成唯一、绝对的专制统制者的狡猾诡计.

sentences.en: She tried to supersede for her tears.
sentences.cn: 她强忍住不让眼泪流出来.

sentences.en: The investment mandate and re - balancing instruction given below will supersede all those recorded previously.
sentences.cn: 以下作出之投资委?及现有重组基金结馀将会取代以前递交之指示.

sentences.en: The use of robots will someday supersede manual labor.
sentences.cn: 机器人的使用有一天会取代人力.

sentences.en: Their map has since been superseded by photographic atlases.
sentences.cn: 他们的地图从此被摄影地图册取代。

sentences.en: This Contract shall supersede all previous communications, either oral or written between the parties.
sentences.cn: 本合同取代双方以前所有的口头或书面通讯.

sentences.en: This highlighted it to be opposite of fixed phone supersede function.
sentences.cn: 这凸显了它对固定电话的替代作用.

sentences.en: We must supersede old machines by [ with ] new ones.
sentences.cn: 我们必须以新机器取代旧机器.

sentences.en: We must supersede old machines by new ones.
sentences.cn: 我们必须以新机器取代旧机器。

sentences.en: Will factory worker is entirely supersede by machine one day.
sentences.cn: 工人将来能完全由机器取代吗.

trans.tran_en: if a new idea, product, or method supersedes another one, it becomes used instead because it is more modern or effective

trans.tran_cn: 取代，接替，更替，继任，将…免职，撤换
trans.tran_en: if a new idea, product, or method supersedes another one, it becomes used instead because it is more modern or effective
